## R Markdown



The read.table command is then used to read the contents of the text files into an R dataframe. 
This is a description of each variable:

* trainingData : the training dataset
* trainingLabels : the activity labels associated with the training dataset
* testData : the test dataset
* testLabels : the activity labels associated with the test dataset
* featureLabels : the labels for the 561 features extracted from the data
* testSubjects : the subject codes for test data
* trainingSubjects : the subject codes for training data
* activities : description of each activity code
